thread.title: BRIEF-Ford President Of North America Raj Nair Exits Company

title: BRIEF-Ford President Of North America Raj Nair Exits Company

organizations.name: north america raj nair exits company
north america raj nair exits company reuters

text: 25 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Ford President Of North America Raj Nair Exits Company Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Ford Motor Co: * RAJ NAIR, FORD’S PRESIDENT OF NORTH AMERICA, EXITS COMPANY * FORD MOTOR CO - DECISION RELATING TO RAJ NAIR “FOLLOWS A RECENT INTERNAL INVESTIGATION INTO REPORTS OF INAPPROPRIATE BEHAVIOR” * FORD - INTERNAL INVESTIGATION DETERMINED CERTAIN BEHAVIOR BY NAIR WAS “INCONSISTENT WITH COMPANY‘S CODE OF CONDUCT” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
